de.systemagmbh.tools.logger.formatter
Class CSysComplexXMLLogFormatter

java.lang.Object
  de.systemagmbh.tools.logger.formatter.ASysLogFormatter
      de.systemagmbh.tools.logger.formatter.CSysComplexXMLLogFormatter
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISysComponent, ISysLogFormatter
public class CSysComplexXMLLogFormatter
extends ASysLogFormatter

The CSysComplexXMLLogFormatter builds log output in xml format. The configuration must contain the following entries to configure the formatter:

DateFormat (This item is optional.)
Example of a log output: 

 ...
 <entry>
     <timestamp>
       <value>07-09-04 09:08:08.142</value>
       <format>dd-MM-yy HH:mm:ss.SSS</format>
     </timestamp>
     <level>
       <value>4</value>
       <name>WARNING</name>
     </level>
     <processid>140</processid>
     <module>TestCSysComplexXMLLogFormatter</module>
     <message>
       <![CDATA[
       java.lang.Exception: test
     at de.systemagmbh.tools.logger.formatter.TestCSysComplexXMLLogFormatter.testFormatLog(TestCSysComplexXMLLogFormatter.java:71)

     at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Native Method)
     at junit.framework.TestCase.runTest(TestCase.java:154)
     at junit.framework.TestCase.runBare(TestCase.java:127)
     at junit.framework.TestResult$1.protect(TestResult.java:106)
     at junit.framework.TestResult.runProtected(TestResult.java:124)
     at junit.framework.TestResult.run(TestResult.java:109)
     at junit.framework.TestCase.run(TestCase.java:118)
     at junit.framework.TestSuite.runTest(TestSuite.java:208)
     at junit.framework.TestSuite.run(TestSuite.java:203)
     at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.junit.runner.RemoteTestRunner.runTests(RemoteTestRunner.java:392)
     at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.junit.runner.RemoteTestRunner.run(RemoteTestRunner.java:276)
     at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.junit.runner.RemoteTestRunner.main(RemoteTestRunner.java:167)
       ]]>
     </message>
 </entry>
 ...

The DTD for validation of log files written with this formatter must have the following entries: 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 ]>

Version:
$Revision: 1.3 $
Author:
Christian Wohanka

Method Detail

init

public void init(ISysConfigItem configItem)
          throws ASysException
Call this method to configure the formatter from a section in the configuration.

Parameters:
configItem - The item in the configuration that contains the formatter data.
Throws:
ASysException - if the items needed by the implementation are not available in the configuration.

formatLog

public String formatLog(String module,
                        Object toBeLogged,
                        int level,
                        Properties addOns)
This method defines the way, how a logger will format the log output.

Parameters:
module - The name of the application part that called the log method.
This is used for the component log levels!
(May be empty if the concret implementation does not need this information.)
toBeLogged - The object that has to be logged.
level - The level that is used for logging the given text.
(May be empty if the concret implementation does not need this information.)
addOns - The parameters for formatting this log output as Properties. These parameters are not set for all the following log outputs. (Use method setProperties for this.)
Returns:
the formatted log output
See Also:
ISysLogFormatter.formatLog(String, Object, int, Properties)

setDateFormat

protected void setDateFormat(String newDateFormatString)
Creates a new SimpleDateFormat out of the given String.
If this is not possible, the DATE_FORMAT_1 will be set.

Parameters:
newDateFormatString - The new date format.

setPID

protected void setPID(String newPID)
Set process id.

Parameters:
newPID - The process id of the virtual machine.
